jmines.view
Class Robot

java.lang.Object
  jmines.view.Robot

public final class Robot
extends Object

The class representing the robot that can play to JMines.
Thanks to waskol for its algorithms (with a little adaptation to work with all the button shapes) (http://delphi.developpez.com/defi/demineur/defieur/).

Author:
Zleurtor

setCheater

public void setCheater(boolean newCheater)
Allows to set a new value to tell whether or not the robot is authorized to cheat.

Parameters:
newCheater - If true, the robot is authorized to cheat, it is not authorized if false.

setReallyClicking

public void setReallyClicking(boolean newReallyClicking)
Allows to set a new value to tell whether or not the robot has to do real clicks.

Parameters:
newReallyClicking - If true the robot has to do real clicks, it will not really click if false.

newRandomAuthorized - If true the robot is authorized to use random tries, it's not authorized if false.

Parameters:
newHelping - If true the robot will help the player, it will not do this if false.

searchTrivialCases

private boolean searchTrivialCases()
Search and solve the two trivial cases in the grid.

Returns:
true if a trivial case has been found and solved, false otherwise.

searchSchemas

private boolean searchSchemas()
Search and solve schemas in the grid.

Returns:
true if a schema has been found and solved, false otherwise.

searchConstraintSatisfactionProblem

private boolean searchConstraintSatisfactionProblem()
Search and solve all the constraints in the grid.

Returns:
true if constraints have been found and solved, false otherwise.

searchRandomly

private boolean searchRandomly()
Search randomly a closed and non flagged tile.

Returns:
true a tile has been chosen and clicked, false otherwise.

getSchemas

private Collection<String> getSchemas(int length,
                                      String actual)
Returns all the possible schemas for a given number of unknown tiles.

Parameters:
length - The number of unknown tiles.
actual - A parameter only used for recursivity.
Returns:
All the possible schemas for a given number of unknown tiles.
